mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, product_type_name, product_type, product_purpose, product_name, product_image, product_desc) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product set product_type_name = #{productTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_purpose = #{productPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_image = #{productImage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, product_desc = #{productDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product_id, product_type_name, product_type, product_purpose, product_name, product_image, product_desc from product where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select product_id, product_type_name, product_type, product_purpose, product_name, product_image, product_desc from product
